name: (Paper 3) Cambridge Key English Test (KET6) - Speaking Course
intro: (Level B1) Advance your speaking skills for the Cambridge KET6 exam with this intensive course. You will engage in structured speaking exercises, express opinions, and refine fluency in real-life conversational situations. This course helps you build confidence and prepares you thoroughly for the KET6 Speaking paper.
lessonNames: Discuss a current topic with your partner. The examiner will ask you to share your opinions on subjects like technology, travel, or daily habits. You will describe experiences and justify your views with examples.
